phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
The Air Temple is one of the most beautiful places in the world.
Aang, I know you are excited but it is been a hundred years since you have been home.
That is why I am so excited!
It is just that a lot can change in all that time..
but I need to see it for myself..
There is a prickle snake in your sleeping bag!
Uncle, I want the repairs made as quickly as possible.
I do not want to stay too long and risk losing his trail.
Do not mention his name on these docks!
Once word gets out that he is alive every firebender will be out looking for him
and I do not want anyone getting in the way.
Getting in the way of what...
What brings you to my harbor?
That is quite a bit of damage.
Yes... you would not believe what happened.
It was what...did we crash or something??
Right into an Earth Kingdom ship.
You must regale me with all the thrilling details.
Sorry, but we have to go.
We would be honored to join you.
Do you have any ginseng tea?
Hey, stomach, be quiet, all right?
I am trying to find us some food.
Who ate all my blubbered seal jerky?
I used it to start the campfire last night.
Awww, no wonder the flames smelled so good.
Before we get to the temple, I want to talk to you about the airbenders.
Well, I just want you to be prepared for what you might see.
They killed my mother and they could have done the same to your people.
Just because no one has seen an airbender does not mean the Fire Nation killed them all.
I know it is hard to accept.
The only way to get to an airbender temple is on a flying bison
and I doubt the Fire Nation has any flying bison.
There it is... the Southern Air Temple.
And by year's end, the Earth Kingdom capital will be under our rule.
The Fire Lord will finally claim victory in this war.
If my father thinks the rest of the world will follow him willingly, then he is a fool.
Two years at sea have done little to temper your tongue.
how is your search for the Avatar going?
We have not found him yet.
The Avatar died a hundred years ago
along with the rest of the airbenders.
Prince Zuko, the Avatar is the only one
who can stop the Fire Nation from winning this war.
If you have an ounce of loyalty left, you will tell me what you have found.
The Avatar probably died a long time ago.
Come on, Uncle, we are going.
Commander Zhao, we interrogated the crew as you instructed.
Prince Zuko had the Avatar in custody, but let him escape.
So where do I get something to eat?
You are lucky enough to be one of the first outsiders
to ever visit an airbender temple and all you can think about is food?
I am just a simple guy with simple needs.
So that is where my friends and I would play airball!
And... over there would be where the bison would sleep... and...
This place used to be full of monks and lemurs and bison.
Now there is just a bunch of weeds.
I cannot believe how much things have changed.
Making him feel better is putting me in a world of hurt.
Aang, there is something you need to see.
Uh... just a new waterbending move I learned.
We have a whole temple to see!
You know, you cannot protect him forever.
You cannot pretend they were not.
If he finds out that the Fire Nation invaded his home
I want you to meet somebody.
Monk Gyatso, the greatest airbender in the world.
He taught me everything I know.
But the true secret is in the gooey center!
My ancient cake making technique is not the only thing on your mind
maybe the monks made a mistake.
The only mistake they made was telling you before you turned sixteen.
But we cannot concern ourselves with what was.
We must act on what is.
But Gyatso, how do I know if I am ready for this?
Your questions will be answered when you are old enough
to enter the Air Temple sanctuary.
Inside you will meet someone who will guide you on your journey.
When you are ready he will reveal himself to you.
are you going to help me with these cakes, or not?
Your aim has improved greatly my young pupil.
There is someone I am ready to meet.
But Aang... no one could have survived in there for a hundred years.
I survived in the iceberg for that long.
Katara, whoever's in there might help me figure out this Avatar thing!
And whoever's in there might have a medley of delicious,
I do not suppose you have a key?
So, a twelve-year-old boy bested you and your firebenders?
You are more pathetic than I thought.
I underestimated him once, but it will not happen again.
No, it will not, because you will not have a second chance.
I have been hunting the Avatar for two years and I...
Capturing the Avatar is too important to leave in a teenager's hands.
but it feels like I know them somehow.
They are lined up in a pattern.
All these people are your past lives, Aang.
Katara, you really believe in that stuff?
When the Avatar dies he is reincarnated into the next nation in the cycle.
That is Avatar Roku, the Avatar before me.
No wonder I did not trust you when we first met.
How do you know his name?
You just could not get any weirder!
That firebender will not know what hit'them.
You are going to be my new pet.
Not if I get him first!
Once I am out to sea, my guards will escort you back to your ship
and you will be free to go.
Are you worried I am going to try and stop you?
I will capture the Avatar before you.
I have hundreds of warships under my command,
and you... you are just a banished prince.
Your own father does not even want you.
and restore my rightful place on the throne.
If your father really wanted you home,
he would have let you return by now, Avatar or no Avatar
but in his eyes you are a failure and a disgrace to the Fire Nation.
You have the scar to prove it.
Maybe you would like one to match!
It is a shame your father will not be here to watch me humiliate you.
I guess your uncle will do.
Prince Zuko, have you forgotten what happened last time you dueled a master?
That hungry guy will not bother you anymore.
Hey Aang, you find my dinner yet?
Aang, I was not really going to eat the lemur,
come on, Aang, everything will be all right.
Let us get out of here.
Send word to the Fire Lord immediately.
He found out firebenders killed Gyatso.
Oh no, it is his avatar spirit!
I am going to try and calm him down.
Well, do it before he blows us off the mountain!
I refuse to let him win.
Next time you get in my way, I promise I will not hold back.
So this is how the great Commander Zhao acts in defeat.
Even in exile my nephew is more honorable than you.
Did you really mean that, Uncle?
I told you ginseng tea is my favorite.
Aang, I know you are upset...
I went through the same thing when I lost my mom.
Monk Gyatso and the other airbenders may be gone,
but you still have a family.
Sokka and I, we are your family now.
Katara and I are not going to let anything happen to you.
And if firebenders found this temple that means they found the other ones, too.
I really am the last airbender.
How is Roku supposed to help me if I cannot talk to him?
Maybe you will find a way.
Looks like you made a new friend, Sokka.
We are all that is left of this place.
What are you going to name him?
